summary.span: 代表 HTTP 實體內容和內容標頭的基底類別。

span.span: A base class representing an HTTP entity body and content headers.

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件的所有內容寫入至做為傳遞資料流物件之後，會完成`stream`參數。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the stream object passed as the `stream` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件的所有內容寫入至做為傳遞資料流物件之後，會完成`stream`參數。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the stream object passed as the `stream` parameter.

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將 HTTP 內容序列化為記憶體資料流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory stream as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件的所有內容寫入至記憶體資料流之後，會完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written to the memory stream. 當作業完成時，屬性傳回的工作物件上包含表示的 HTTP 內容的記憶體資料流。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the memory stream that that represents the HTTP content. 傳回的資料流可用來讀取內容使用不同的資料流 Api。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs. 方法緩衝到記憶體資料流內容。The method buffers the content to a memory stream. 在衍生的類別可以覆寫此行為，如果沒有更好的方法來擷取為資料流的內容。Derived classes can override this behavior if there is a better way to retrieve the content as stream. 例如，位元組陣列或字串，可以使用更有效率的方法方式，例如自動換行的唯讀位元組或字串周圍。)For example, a byte array or a string could use a more efficient method way such as wrapping a read-only around the bytes or string.)

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性處置 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

summary.span: 釋放 Unmanaged 資源，並處置 所使用的 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources and disposes of the managed resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源； 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性處置 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

summary.span: 取得 HTTP 內容標頭，如 RFC 2616 中所定義。

span.span: Gets the HTTP content headers as defined in RFC 2616.

value.span: 內容標頭，如 RFC 2616 中所定義。

span.span: The content headers as defined in RFC 2616.

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將 HTTP 內容序列化至記憶體緩衝區。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync() cil managed
Public Function LoadIntoBufferAsync () As Task
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ LoadIntoBufferAsync();

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將 HTTP 內容序列化至記憶體緩衝區。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會在記憶體緩衝區中已序列化的所有內容之後, 完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the memory buffer. 記憶體緩衝區序列化內容後，會呼叫其中一個方法會將記憶體緩衝區的內容複製到目標資料流。After content is serialized to a memory buffer, calls to one of the methods will copy the content of the memory buffer to the target stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync (long maxBufferSize);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task LoadIntoBufferAsync(int64 maxBufferSize) cil managed
Public Function LoadIntoBufferAsync (maxBufferSize As Long) As Task
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ LoadIntoBufferAsync(long maxBufferSize);

param.name: maxBufferSize
param.span: 要使用之緩衝區的大小上限，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the buffer to use.

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將 HTTP 內容序列化至記憶體緩衝區。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a memory buffer as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會在記憶體緩衝區中已序列化的所有內容之後, 完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the memory buffer. 記憶體緩衝區序列化內容後，會呼叫其中一個方法會將記憶體緩衝區的內容複製到目標資料流。After content is serialized to a memory buffer, calls to one of the methods will copy the content of the memory buffer to the target stream. 若內容超過傳入的值`maxBufferSize`參數時，擲回例外狀況。If the content exceeds the value passed in the `maxBufferSize` parameter , an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<byte[]> ReadAsByteArrayAsync ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<unsigned int8[]> ReadAsByteArrayAsync() cil managed
Public Function ReadAsByteArrayAsync () As Task(Of Byte())
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task<cli::array <System::Byte> ^> ^ ReadAsByteArrayAsync();

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將位元組陣列的 HTTP 內容序列化。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a byte array as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件做為位元組陣列的所有內容寫入之後，會完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written as a byte array. 當作業完成時，傳回的工作物件上的屬性包含 HTTP 內容的位元組陣列。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the byte array with the HTTP content.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.IO.Stream> ReadAsStreamAsync ();
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.IO.Stream> ReadAsStreamAsync() cil managed
Public Function ReadAsStreamAsync () As Task(Of Stream)
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::IO::Stream ^> ^ ReadAsStreamAsync();

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將 HTTP 內容序列化，並傳回代表內容的資料流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content and return a stream that represents the content as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後才會完成所有的資料流，表示讀取內容之後。The returned object will complete after all of the stream that represents content has been read. 當作業完成時，屬性傳回的工作物件包含表示的 HTTP 內容的資料流。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the stream that that represents the HTTP content. 傳回的資料流可用來讀取內容使用不同的資料流 Api。The returned stream can then be used to read the content using various stream APIs.

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將 HTTP 內容序列化為字串。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a string as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件做為字串的所有內容寫入之後，會完成。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been written as a string. 當作業完成時，傳回的工作物件上的屬性包含 HTTP 內容的字串。Once the operation completes, the property on the returned task object contains the string with the HTTP content.

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式將 HTTP 內容序列化為資料流。

span.span: Serialize the HTTP content to a stream as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後的所有內容已序列化資料流物件傳入`stream`參數。The returned object will complete after all of the content has been serialized to the stream object passed in the `stream` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract bool TryComputeLength (out long length);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryComputeLength([out] int64& length) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function TryComputeLength (ByRef length As Long) As Boolean
protected public: abstract bool TryComputeLength([Runtime::InteropServices::Out] long % length);

param.name: length
param.span: HTTP 內容的位元組長度。

span.span: The length in bytes of the HTTP content.

summary.span: 判斷 HTTP 內容是否有有效的位元組長度。

span.span: Determines whether the HTTP content has a valid length in bytes.

returns.span: 若 為有效的長度則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if is a valid length; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓 HTTP 內容來計算內容的長度。The method gives a HTTP content the ability to calculate the content length. 這是適用於內容的類型，也就是能夠輕易地計算內容的長度。This is useful for content types which are able to easily calculate the content length. 如果計算內容的長度不可能或昂貴 （而需要讓系統用來緩衝整個內容序列化會其中可能高度耗費資源，或需要配置大量記憶體系統），這個方法可以傳回`false`。If computing the content length is not possible or expensive (would require the system to buffer the whole content where the serialization would be expensive or require the system to allocate a lot of memory), this method can return `false`. 如果此方法傳回`false`，這表示，需要區塊的傳輸或內容必須在傳送到伺服器之前會緩衝處理。If this method returns `false`, this implies that either chunked transfer is needed or the content must get buffered before being sent to the server.
